name: Electrum
tag_list: plating-montreal, placage-montral, placage-or, gold-plating, placage-argent, silver-plating, lectroplacage, electroplating
overview:
Incorporated in 1990 and occupying a 20000 square feet facility, Electrum’s facilities are designed to accommodate the need of the electronic, telecom, hydroelectricity, aerospace and military industries.

Our experienced staffs specialize in a working partneship with our clientele to develop the best possible surface finishing techniques to suit each and every application. Using the latest techniques and inspection equipment, our team is ready to be challenged to meet your most stringent surface finishing requirements.
